page.title: 09Housing In Riddlesden
page.content: We decided to do a survey of houses in our area. The best way to find out information was by asking our parents on a questionnaire. We put the address of our school then a short sentence explaining what we were doing. The letter was given to all the 1st year children in Grange M.S. The first question was"What kind of a house do you live in?" The results were- semi-detached 17, bungalow 0, terrace 9, detached 3, cottage 0, flat 1. We received 31 slips. When asked why they chose to live in this area the answers were very different, but most came for convenience near shops or work and because they like being near the country. 6 houses were built after 1945, 13 1918-1939, 10 1837-1914 and none before that.
